designers.biography: First head designer of Coach (1962-1974)

designers.biography: Founder of Stuart Weitzman

designers.biography: Former Creative Director of Stuart Weitzman (2017-2018)

designers.name: Edmundo Castillo
designers.biography: Head of Design at Stuart Weitzman (2018-present)

designers.name: Valentino Garavani
designers.biography: Founder of Valentino and legendary designer known for his elegant red dresses

designers.name: Maria Grazia Chiuri
designers.biography: Former Co-Creative Director of Valentino (2008-2016)

designers.name: Pierpaolo Piccioli
designers.biography: Creative Director of Valentino (2008-present), sole director since 2016

designers.name: Pierre Balmain
designers.biography: Founder of Balmain and pioneer of post-war French fashion

designers.name: Oscar de la Renta
designers.biography: Creative Director of Balmain (1993-2002)

designers.name: Christophe Decarnin
designers.biography: Creative Director of Balmain (2006-2011)

designers.name: Olivier Rousteing
designers.biography: Creative Director of Balmain (2011-present)

designers.name: Gianni Versace
designers.biography: Founder of Versace and iconic fashion designer known for bold prints and innovative designs

designers.name: Donatella Versace
designers.biography: Chief Creative Officer of Versace since 1997, sister of Gianni Versace

designers.name: Jimmy Choo
designers.biography: Co-founder of Jimmy Choo, renowned shoe designer

designers.name: Tamara Mellon
designers.biography: Co-founder of Jimmy Choo

designers.name: Sandra Choi
designers.biography: Creative Director of Jimmy Choo since 2013

designers.name: Jean Paul Gaultier
designers.biography: Founder of Jean Paul Gaultier and iconic French fashion designer

designers.name: Florence Tétier
designers.currentRole: Creative Director of Jean Paul Gaultier

designers.name: Carolina Herrera
designers.biography: Founder of Carolina Herrera and Venezuelan-American fashion designer

designers.name: Dries Van Noten
designers.biography: Founder and Creative Director of Dries Van Noten

designers.name: Gabrielle 'Coco' Chanel
designers.biography: Founder of Chanel, revolutionary designer who transformed women's fashion in the 20th century

designers.name: Virginie Viard
designers.biography: Succeeded Karl Lagerfeld as creative director of Chanel in 2019, after working alongside him for over 30 years

designers.name: Thierry Hermès
designers.biography: Founder of Hermès, began as a harness workshop serving European noblemen

designers.name: Jean-Louis Dumas
designers.biography: Fifth-generation family member who led Hermès from 1978 to 2006, transforming it into a global luxury powerhouse

designers.name: Pierre-Alexis Dumas
designers.biography: Artistic Director of Hermès and son of Jean-Louis Dumas

designers.name: Mary-Kate Olsen
designers.biography: Co-founder of The Row with her twin sister Ashley Olsen

designers.name: Ashley Olsen
designers.biography: Co-founder of The Row with her twin sister Mary-Kate Olsen

designers.name: Rick Owens
designers.biography: American-born designer known for his avant-garde, gothic aesthetic

designers.name: Marine Serre
designers.biography: French designer known for her futuristic, sustainable approach and crescent moon motif

designers.name: Grace Wales Bonner
designers.biography: British designer exploring cultural identity through her menswear-focused label

designers.name: Simone Rocha
designers.biography: Irish designer known for her romantic yet modern aesthetic, daughter of designer John Rocha

designers.name: Simon Porte Jacquemus
designers.biography: Self-taught French designer who founded his eponymous label at age 19, known for his playful, Mediterranean-inspired aesthetic

designers.name: Ditte Reffstrup
designers.biography: Creative Director of Ganni, who transformed the Danish brand into a global contemporary fashion phenomenon

designers.name: Nicolaj Reffstrup
designers.biography: CEO of Ganni and husband of Ditte Reffstrup, focused on the business and sustainability aspects of the brand

designers.name: Frans Truelsen
designers.biography: Original founder of Ganni who established it as a cashmere brand in Denmark

designers.name: Rei Kawakubo
designers.currentRole: Founder and Creative Director of Comme des Garçons

designers.name: Yohji Yamamoto
designers.currentRole: Founder and Creative Director of Yohji Yamamoto

designers.name: Jun Takahashi
designers.currentRole: Founder and Creative Director of Undercover

tenures.impact_description: Revolutionized fashion with avant-garde designs and iconic collections
Bringing fresh perspective while honoring house codes
Introducing gender-fluid aesthetics to the historic house

notable_collections: Spring 2018 - Final Collection as Creative Director
tenures.impact_description: Established a legacy of elegant American fashion
Modernizing the house while maintaining its elegant DNA
Creating unique artistic vision through prints and textiles

achievements: Maintained Chanel's legacy while bringing a more understated approach
Established Hermès as a harness workshop serving European noblemen
Transformed Hermès into a global luxury brand
Maintained family tradition while expanding the brand's artistic vision
CFDA Womenswear Designer of the Year (multiple times)
CFDA Womenswear Designer of the Year (multiple times)
British Designer of the Year Womenswear 2016
Staged iconic runway shows in lavender fields and wheat fields
tenures.impact_description: Created a distinctive aesthetic that blends French heritage with modern sensibilities

achievements: Transformed Ganni into a global fashion phenomenon
tenures.impact_description: Redefined Scandinavian style with a playful, colorful aesthetic
Grew Ganni from a small Danish brand to a global contemporary fashion label
Established Ganni as a cashmere brand in Denmark

achievements: Built Diesel into a global denim brand
tenures.impact_description: Revolutionized the denim industry with innovative designs and marketing

achievements: Created iconic designs like Tabi boots
tenures.impact_description: Fundamentally challenged fashion conventions with conceptual designs

achievements: Revitalized the brand while respecting its heritage
tenures.impact_description: Brought a new theatrical perspective while honoring Margiela's conceptual approach

achievements: Built Marni into a respected luxury brand
tenures.impact_description: Created a unique aesthetic that appealed to intellectual fashion consumers

achievements: Brought a youthful energy to Marni
tenures.impact_description: Maintained Marni's artistic spirit while bringing a fresh perspective
Defined modern minimalism in fashion
Brief return to her eponymous brand
Second return to her eponymous brand

achievements: Revitalized the brand's minimalist aesthetic for a new generation
tenures.impact_description: Brought a modern sensibility to Jil Sander's minimalist legacy

achievements: Revitalized the brand's minimalist aesthetic for a new generation
